SugarwiseApp // ======= onbnoarding ======== Hi!\nWelcome Scan Your Foods\n Daily Report of\nYour_Food Sugar Warning\nConsumption Start manage your sugar intake with SugarWise for making informed and mindful choices about your sweet indulgences. You can easily enter the type of food you consume using the camera feature to detect it automatically View your daily report based on all the food you consumed that day.
